EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-12-21
EmailTemplate.subject: Boeing's Transformation Journey and Creating Fusion at a Fortune 15 Company
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
december 21, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/niki-allen?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> "Culture Will Eat Strategy for Lunch" Niki Allen, Director of the Office of the CIO and Chief of Staff at Boeing, presents on Boeing's transformation journey at SpringOne Platform 2017. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017/niki-allen?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/creating-fusion-at-a-fortune-15-company-with-50k-employees-a406479eabbf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Creating Fusion at a Fortune 15 Company with 50K Employees Jim Shingler, Director of Office of Development Transformation at Cardinal Health, explains how his team helps empower people through embedded coaching, pairing, conducting regular retrospectives (sans managers), and defining product owners. How Cardinal Health builds revolutionary tech <[[https://builttoadapt.io/creating-fusion-at-a-fortune-15-company-with-50k-employees-a406479eabbf?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-past-present-and-future-of-infrastructure-and-application-deployment?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Past, Present, and Future of Infrastructure and Application Deployment Paul Czarkowski talks Paas, Kubernetes, DevOps, and containers, their history and where they'll be in 2018. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-past-present-and-future-of-infrastructure-and-application-deployment?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[http://vmob.me/DE4Q17Pivotal]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/in-2018-clear-out-your-portfolio-underbrush-before-you-have-to-burn-it-all-down-86ae18f98f24?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> In 2018, Clear Out Your Portfolio Underbrush Before You Have to Burn it All Down Before you finally embark on your digital transformation in 2018, do these things first. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/in-2018-clear-out-your-portfolio-underbrush-before-you-have-to-burn-it-all-down-86ae18f98f24?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/comparing-bosh-ansible-chef-part-1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Infrastructure as Code is Not Enough: Comparing BOSH, Ansible, and Chef - Part 1 Bryan Friedman compares and breaks down the "infrastructure as code" tools; BOSH, Ansible and Chef. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/comparing-bosh-ansible-chef-part-1?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/going-cloud-native-at-orange-france-ep-53?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Going Cloud-Native at Orange France (Ep. 53) Xavier Perret joins Jeff and Dormain to share the story of Orange France's ongoing digital transformation. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/going-cloud-native-at-orange-france-ep-53?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/death-and-devops-dd0517605802?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Death and DevOps Dormain Drewitz explains how dealing with unfortunate things shape a culture. What Happens when there's an Outage? <[[https://builttoadapt.io/death-and-devops-dd0517605802?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 1/9-1/12 GemFire Developer Training Course, San Francisco <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1087]]>
1/11 Secrets of Successful Digital Transformers, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-11-secrets-of-successful-digital-transformers-webinar?utm_source=social&utm_medium=link&utm_campaign=siblings-pcf-q118]]>
1/16-1/18 Pivotal Cloud Foundry Developer Training Course, Chicago <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1092]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
